com.deezer.sdk.player.event

Interface OnBufferStateChangeListener


  • public interface OnBufferStateChangeListener
    Defines the behavior of a listener of the buffer's state change. It will be notified of any change in the state of the buffer.
    Author:
    Deezer
    See Also:
    BufferState

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBufferStateChange(BufferState state, double percent)
      Callback method that will be called when the buffer's state changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onBufferStateChange

        void onBufferStateChange(BufferState state,
                       double percent)
        Callback method that will be called when the buffer's state changes.
        Parameters:
        state - the new state in which the buffer has entered.
        percent - the percentage of data buffered.
